key.name: debug
key.description: If enabled, cinnamon-session will output debug information.

key.name: x-sync
key.description: If enabled, cinnamon-session and all (gtk) children will make all X requests synchronously, for debugging x errors.

key.name: auto-save-session
key.description: If enabled, cinnamon-session will save the session automatically.

key.name: logout-prompt
key.description: If enabled, cinnamon-session will prompt the user before ending a session.

key.name: show-fallback-warning
key.description: If enabled, cinnamon-session will display a warning dialog after login if the session was automatically fallen back.

key.name: autostart-blacklist
key.summary: Applications to block from autostarting or appearing in the app system
key.description: A list of applications or desktop names (without the .desktop extension) to prevent from being accessible during the session.

key.name: quit-delay-toggle
key.summary: Toggles if there should be a timer when ending the session
key.description: Toggles whether or not there's a timer to automatically end the current session

key.name: quit-time-delay
key.summary: The time delay before quitting the system automatically
key.description: The time delay before the shutdown/logout dialogue quits the system automatically

key.name: prefer-hybrid-sleep
key.summary: If your hardware and login service supports 'Hybrid Sleep' then use it instead of normal Suspend
key.description: Whether or not to attempt to use hybrid sleep mode for suspend. If it is unsupported, normal sleep will be used instead

key.name: suspend-then-hibernate
key.summary: The system is suspended and put into hibernation after being suspended for a certain time. (Defaults to 2h, see systemd-sleep.conf)
key.description: Whether or not to attempt to use suspend-then-hibernate. If it is unsupported, normal suspend will be used instead
